<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Earthsight Box](/Equipment.aspx?ID=728)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 575 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fine wooden box is inlaid with [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3) runes, with hinges and a clasp of forged iron. The box contains a few handfuls of fine sand.

<document level="2" id="action-575" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
